mule-project.name: rabbitmq_order_processing_example
mule-project.description:
Enhance MuleSoft Order Processing example to use RabbitMQ to forward orders to fulfillment and accounting (fanout to both). Within fulfillment, there is a queue for each item type (direct exchange routing).
MuleSoft original description: Process an order from a web service. Split the order into individual items and route the items to corresponding manufacturers for fufillment. In addition, a contact is added to Salesforce for each processed order. A separate flow deploys a REST service that allows manufacturers to view the list of ordered items.
